title: Wipro's case against former CFO Jatin Dalal referred to arbitration
description: On January 3, Wipro and Dalal were directed to resolve the case under section 8 of the Arbitration Conciliation Act, 1996. The official order will be uploaded in the next week.
content: Indian IT major Wipro's case against its former chief financial officer (CFO) Jatin Dalal has been referred to arbitration, to be heard outside court proceedings as per an order by Bengaluru civil court's additional city civil and sessions judge Doddegowda K.
